mapper.sql: id, uid, mid, name, remark, picture, num, status
mapper.select:
select
from focus where uid = #{uid} and status=1
mapper.update: update focus set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
